TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebFaultException`1<T> extends System.ServiceModel.FaultException`1<!T>
Public Class WebFaultException(Of T) Inherits FaultException(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class WebFaultException : System::ServiceModel::FaultException<T>

Docs.summary: Represents a fault that can have an associated HTTP status code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When using a WCF REST endpoint (<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>) the HTTP status code on the response is set accordingly. However, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException> can be used with non-REST endpoints and behaves like a regular <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>.
Use this class to return error details using the same format as the operation.
